fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: If the years since the last successful event is smaller than 6, then v2ddthrepl =1, afterwards decreases by 0.06 units per year until 0.1; if the event was not successful during the first years v2ddthrepl =0.9, afterwards decreases by 0.1 units per year until 0.1.Responses: Percent.
fxInfo_question: How effective is the menace of a plebiscite?
name: v2ddthrepl
